ygData.subject: Re: The Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: I, for one, have heard enough about the fiery avenger, paladin class skills and whether Aradune is or is not a GM.  Surely there is another list that this
ygData.messageBody:
I, for one, have heard enough about the fiery avenger, paladin class skills
and whether Aradune is or is not a GM. Surely there is another list that
this discussion would be more appropriate on other than EQ Cheats. Sorry,
but when I get a dozen messages on each of these topics every day on a list
that is supposed to be for other information it gets old. I didn't
subscribe to this list for these types of discussions.
-----Original Message-----
From: XxKommiexX@... <XxKommiexX@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 8:06 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] The Fiery Avenger


>From: XxKommiexX@...
>
>What are you talking about? I have a paladin, and he uses 2 H slash. Why
>would you use normal if you don't get duel wield, but yuo get double
attack.
>When yuo get high enough level to get a ghoulbane, then start training 1 H
>slash. Until then, I wouldn't recommend using 1 H slash.
>
